tool_description: Parretir's SEC Refinery API provides cleanly parsed full plain text from SEC filings.
name: SEC Refinery
title: SEC Refinery

api_list.name: 10-K Filings Plain Text
api_list.description: Provides plain text of 10-K filings for a set of companies in JSON.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sec-refinery.p.rapidapi.com/sec-refinery/v1/filings/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sec-refinery.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sec-refinery.p.rapidapi.com/sec-refinery/v1/filings/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sec-refinery.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
